::Zardus/FZ/DevilDuer::

The sword slashes through Zardus' hastily raised hand. He curses as he pulls 
the sword out and drops it behind him. Mech fluid drips on the floor.

"Internal defences activate. Concentrate fire on Serpentor."

Two autoguns pop up and fire at Serpentor.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ and DevilDuer smash into opposite walls, FZ hitting one of the autoguns. 
The autogun explodes and FZ flies into Serpentor.

DevilDuer gets up and fires at the mess of FZ and Serpentor.
